ComicInfo.Summary:
Fakes are everywhere. 007 has no clue who to trust. His training and intuition are all that stand between the shadows and the light. By VITA AYALA (Morbius, Gamora), DANNY LORE (Queen Of Bad Dreams) and ERICA D’URSO (Captain Marvel).
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Regular Cover | Afua Richardson | 1 | B/RI | 1:10 Retailer Incentive "Black & White" Edition Variant Cover | Afua Richardson | 2 | C/RI | 1:20 Retailer Incentive "Black & White Virgin" Edition Variant Cover | Afua Richardson | 3 | D/RI | 1:25 Retailer Incentive "Vintage Paperback Homage" Edition Variant Cover | Afua Richardson | 4 | E/LE | Limited Edition "Virgin Art" Edition Variant Cover | Afua Richardson | 5 | F/FOC | 1:11 FOC Bonus Incentive "Tinted" Edition Variant Cover | Afua Richardson | 6 | G/FOC | 1:15 FOC Bonus Incentive "Virgin Tinted" Edition Variant Cover | Afua Richardson | 7 |
